title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.16 - Class gsa saline groundwaters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.16 - Class gsa saline groundwaters

State Regulations

The best usages of Class GSA waters are as a source of
potable mineral waters, or conversion to fresh potable waters, or as raw
material for the manufacture of sodium chloride or its derivatives or similar
products. Class GSA waters are saline groundwaters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
701.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
